channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tour de France Highlights
channel.desc: Stage 20: Nantua - Pontarlier: Gary Imlach presents highlights from Stage 20 of the 2025 Tour de France as the riders face a hilly ordeal on the penultimate stage of the race.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's French Adventure
channel.desc: L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue: James's journey brings him to the riverside town of L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue, the adopted home of his hero Keith Floyd and where Floyd once had a restaurant. S1 Ep15.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
channel.desc: James is back and is serving up a couple of delicious dishes for Nigel Havers while also enjoying recipes from chefs Dipna Anand, Tony Tobin, and Jonathan Phang. S8 Ep10.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by comedian Laura Smyth for some belly dancing, Michael and Gen transform another charity founder, and Aldo Zilli serves up delicious mocktails. S1 Ep15.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan this time are Brian Conley, Corrie legend Thelma Barlow, and DIY expert Wayne Perrey to upcycle an old dresser into a potting station for the greenhouse.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ninja Warrior UK
channel.desc: It's the semi-final, and the course is more extreme than ever as the best competitors from four heats return to fight it out for a place in the final. S5 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
channel.desc: Bond film starring Roger Moore and Christopher Lee, 1974. 007 learns that he has become the target of an assassin who kills his victims with a highly distinctive weapon.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: UEFA Women's Euro 2025 Final
channel.desc: Coverage of the 2025 UEFA Women's Euro 2025 final from St Jakob-Park in Basel.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Karen Pirie
channel.desc: Detective drama. The team are closer than ever to the truth as Karen digs into Cat's life and disappearance, but a shock discovery changes the course of the investigation. S2 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Creed III
channel.desc: Boxing drama film sequel starring Michael B Jordan and Tessa Thompson, 2023. Adonis Creed faces more than just a fight when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Motorsport UK
channel.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Snetterton featuring racing from the Porsche Carrera Cup Great Britain and the Wera Tools F4 British Championship. S21 Ep10.

channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.title: Tour de France Highlights
channel.desc: Stage 21: Mantes-la-Ville - Paris Champs-Elysees: Gary Imlach is joined by Chris Boardman and Pete Kennaugh for highlights from Paris of the final stage of the 2025 Tour de France.

channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK

channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Roisin Conaty, Rickie Haywood-Williams, and Sunetra Sarker trying to guess the popular phrases this time.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Chasing the Lingo jackpot are brothers Louis and Connor from Stockport, married couple Julie and Joe from Hull, and quiz fans Suzy and Dave from Chester. Hosted by Adil Ray.

channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: All that stands between Rosie from Chelmsford, Steve from Wakefield, Kallan from Cardiff and Seb from Wareham and thousands of pounds is one of the country's finest quiz brains.

channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Cain and Moira take revenge on Kim, Mack misses an opportunity to express his feelings, and Robert is suspicious of John's heroism.

channel.desc: Abi's discovery of Kevin's despicable lie propels her into Carl's arms, Sam gives Lily a taste of her own medicine, and a meeting to determine Laila's future takes place.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The celebrities are cast out to sea, Lucy has a moving encounter with the endangered great hammerhead shark, and Lenny opens up to Ade about his motives for being here. S1 Ep3.
